name: paper-progress
title: Paper progress

secondaryProgress.name: secondaryProgress
secondaryProgress.description: The number that represents the current secondary progress.
secondaryProgress.title: Secondary progress

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description:
If true, this slider is disabled.  A disabled slider cannot be tapped
or dragged to change the slider value.
disabled.title: Disabled

editable.name: editable
editable.description: If true, an input is shown and user can use it to set the slider value.
editable.title: Editable

immediateValue.name: immediateValue
immediateValue.description:
The immediate value of the slider.  This value is updated while the user
is dragging the slider.
immediateValue.title: Immediate value

core-change.name: core-change
core-change.description: Fired when the slider's value changes.
core-change.title: Core change

change.name: change
change.description:
Fired when the slider's value changes due to user interaction.

Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
bound variable will not trigger this event.
change.title: Change
